== Video Overview ==

Ubuntu Dapper and Edgy ship with the free <code>nv</code> driver for NVidia based video cards. There is a proprietary driver which supports accelerated 3D. This screencast shows how to install and enable the driver.

== Target Audience ==

* Users with NVidia video cards

== Pre-requisites ==

* None

== Required Knowledge ==

* None

== Recommended Knowledge ==

* None

== Objectives ==

* Explain the difference between the open/free nv driver and the close/proprietary nvidia driver
* Explain the benefits and the pitfalls of using each driver
* Install, enable and test the closed driver
* Disable and un-install the closed driver
